amendment.description: To require a study by the Government Accountability Office on the efficacy of strategies used by the Federal Aviation Administration and the Department of Transportation to address flight delays at airports in the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2826 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2826 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S11399-11400; text: CR S11399) To require a study by the Government Accountability Office on the efficacy of strategies used by the Federal Aviation Administration and the Department of Transportation to address flight delays at airports in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2826 proposed by Senator Menendez.
